original_body_lines: Leading social media influencer Khalid Al Ameri, who is based in the Middle East, yesterday announced his visit to  Sri Lanka.
The popular Emirati blogger, who creates content with his wife Salama Mohamed, will be in the island nation till June 5 (Monday).
Ameri took to his social media handles to share the update but did not elaborate on his plans.
“Sri Lanka here we come!! I can’t wait to meet you all and discover this beautiful country inshAllah,” posted Ameri.
Within just hours of the update, thousands of his followers from Sri Lanka expressed their excitement over his visit.
Ameri creates culturally-relevant material that is made for the international community.

A graduate from Stanford University, he was featured on the 2020 list of ‘100 Most Powerful Arabs’ by Gulf Business; he is also the first social media personality to be awarded a Dubai Star in the Downtown Dubai Walk of Fame.
